rooms.Name: The Drawbridge
rooms.Description:
You are crossing over a large moat along the drawbridege.  You are now
standing in the alcove before the doors.  They are wide open.  On the front
of the castle is some writing in blood that is difficult for you to make out.  You seem to notice dark clouds surrounding the top of the castle, as if light
never enters....

Exits.Description: There is a large gate blocking the entrance to the castle.

ExtraDescs.Description: It looks old and rusty, but very solid.  There is a keyhole.

The writing is very hard to understand and the blood is old and dry.
But as you study it further, it looks like:

   THE DEAD WALKS !!!
     THE DEAD WALKS !!!
       BEWARE OF THE UNDEAd....
                              .....
                                 (blood drops to the ground)

rooms.Name: The kitchen
rooms.Description:
You have found a way to the kitchen of the dead.  It smells like burning
flesh.  There are pots here, with boiling water.  A large table sets in the 
middle of the room with tons of overcooked body parts.

Exits.Description: That is the floor to the first level of the castle.

ExtraDescs.Description:
As you look into the boiling pot, you notice a human head float to the top.
It seems as if the eyes were gouged out.

rooms.Name: Southwest corner
rooms.Description: This is the southwest corner of the castle.  There are large pillars here.

rooms.Name: Entrance to Castle
rooms.Description:
You have entered the castle hallway.  It continues northwards, while the 
entrance to the castle is south.  You may go west and east inside the castle.

rooms.Name: Southeast corner
rooms.Description: You are at the southeast corner of the castle.  There are large pillars here.

rooms.Name: Western wall
rooms.Description: This is the western wall of the castle.  There are more pillars here.

rooms.Name: A hallway
rooms.Description:
This is the center of a hallway in the castle.  You may go any standard
direction from here.

rooms.Name: Eastern wall
rooms.Description: This is the eastern wall of the castle.  There are more pillars here.

rooms.Name: Northwest corner
rooms.Description: You are in the northwest corner of the castle.

rooms.Name: North end of hallway
rooms.Description:
You have reached the north end of the hallway. Stairs lead up and down, and a
pair of ornate double doors are to your north.

Exits.Description: an ornate set of double-doors bars your way.
The stairs appear to lead up to the second floor.

rooms.Name: Northeast corner
rooms.Description: You are in the northeast corner of the castle.

rooms.Name: Bottom of northwest tower
rooms.Description:
You are beneath the northwest tower in the castle.  You can go east or
south.

rooms.Name: The second floor
rooms.Description: You are at the top of the stairway.  You can go south, west or east.

rooms.Name: Below the northeast tower
rooms.Description:
You are beneath the northeast tower in the castle.  You may go south and
west.

rooms.Name: Western wall
rooms.Description: You are at the western wall of the second floor in the castle.

rooms.Name: Center room
rooms.Description:
This is the center of the second floor in the castle.  Exits lead in all 
general directions.  There is a coffin here.

ExtraDescs.Description:
The coffin looks clean.  It has no signs of dust.  The inside is lined with
red velvet.  It is open.

rooms.Name: Eastern wall
rooms.Description: You are at the eastern wall atop the second floor in the castle.

rooms.Name: Below the southwest tower
rooms.Description: Above you is the southwest tower.  You may go north or east.

rooms.Name: Atop the southern wall
rooms.Description:
You stand above the front of the castle.  Below you, you can barely make out
the bridge through the thick layers of darkness that always surround the 
castle.

rooms.Name: Bottom of the southeast tower
rooms.Description: Above you is the southeast tower of the castle.  You may go north or west.

rooms.Name: The throne room
rooms.Description:
You have found the throne room.  Here is where the evil vampire lord some-
times sits upon his throne in the shadows and rules over the hordes of un-
dead. The only magic that can be used in here is his own.  This is his 
castle and he will keep it that way!

Exits.Description: an ornate set of double-doors bars your way.
You have found a hidden passage beneath the throne!

rooms.Name: The Treasure Room
rooms.Description:
You have found the vampire lord's secret treasure hoard. *sniff sniff* It
smells kinda strange in here, like meat that's been left out in the sun...the
smell of rotting flesh. You begin to wonder what kind of guards the vampire
lord might have placed down here to keep his riches safe.

Exits.Description: There seems to be a door in the wall buried underneath a pile of treasure.

rooms.Name: The northwest tower
rooms.Description:
You are atop the northwest tower.  Wow!  What a view!  There is nothing but
dark clouds surrounding you.

rooms.Name: The northeast tower
rooms.Description:
You are on top of the northeast tower of the castle.  All you can see is dark
clouds.

rooms.Name: On the southwest tower
rooms.Description:
You are on top of the highest tower in the castle.  You can see nothing below
you because of the dark clouds that surround the castle.

rooms.Name: The southeast tower
rooms.Description:
You have climbed atop the southeast tower of the castle.  A dark haze of
clouds impair your vision.

rooms.Name: The Secret Chamber
rooms.Description: You have entered the lich's secret chamber.  Watch yourself.

rooms.Name: A dirt road leading to a rusted gate
rooms.Description:
You are standing on a dirt road leading toward a stormy castle.  The castle
lies on top of the large mountain.  You can see lightning striking everywhere.

rooms.Name: In front of the rusted gate
rooms.Description:
You are standing in front of a large rusted gate.  The letter 'D' is imprinted
upon a large shield that is on the gate.  You hear a howl in the distance
as you look up to the castle.
There is a rusted sign on the gate.

ExtraDescs.Description:
******
Welcome to the castle of the Count, may your stay here be fulfilling.
******

rooms.Name: Inside the gate
rooms.Description:
You are standing within the gate.  Before you the path rises up into the air
heading toward the castle.  The lightning strikes show castles features.

rooms.Name: Before the Stairway of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are standing before the Stairway of Blood.  As the rain pours down, the
rain dripping down the stairs appears as blood draining down the stairway.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are on the Stairs of blood.  They continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: Plumetting to a screaming bloody DEATH
rooms.Description:
We told you to keep your head and hands inside the ride at all times.
You decided to disobey the rules.  As you fall to the ground you can see
a small opening that looks like it is the temple.  The hole isn't
going to be wide enuff, but if there is enough of your corpse left to
drip through the whole, you might be returned there.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are continuing on the Stairs of Blood.  They continue around the mountain
endlessly.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are continuing along the Stairs of Blood.  They seem to endlessly continue
around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are continuing along the Stairs of Blood.  The stairs wind around the
mountain upwardly, as well as toward the ground.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.  You still
cannot see the end or the beginning from where you are.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are standing on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description: You are standing on the Stairs of Blood, they continue around the mountain.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are trying to keep your balance on the Stairs of Blood.  There
are strong gusts of wind that make you want to just jump off into the
nothingness that sorrounds you.  You must continue.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the Stairs of Blood.  You can continue, or you
can jump, take your pick.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are standing on the Stairs of Blood.  The feeling of evil is strongest
if you continue toward the castle.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are nearing the end of your journey on the Stairs of Blood.  You
see the castle entrance ahead of you.  The wind has picked up considerably
as well as some earthquake type shaking.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are almost at the end of the Stairs of Blood, in the distance
you can here someone cackling.

rooms.Name: On the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are at the end.  Within a few steps you can see the gateway to the
building itself.  The Stairs of Blood have let you live.

rooms.Name: The End of the Stairs of Blood
rooms.Description:
You are standing at a gate to a courtyard.  The large courtyard seems to
surround the entire castle.  To the east and west there is a ledge.
In front of you is the gate.

rooms.Name: On a wind swept ledge
rooms.Description:
You are STUCK, you try and get back, but you will slip and fall for
sure.  Though as you look at one of the rocks, it looks like
this may be a secret entrance around the troll.  I would try the
secret entrance and see if it is really a secret at all.

rooms.Name: Within the gate
rooms.Description:
You are standing within the gate of Dracula's castle.  Before you is a mote
across the more is the main gate.  The courtyard you are in has many small
huts and such.  There is bustling and so on.

rooms.Name: Within the courtyard
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the central courtyard of the castle of the count.  There
is a large hut to your right, while there is moat between you and the castle
entrance.

rooms.Name: The Kitchen
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a grisly-looking kitchen. Bloody is smeared all over
everything...it looks like the cook has a real zeal for his work. Now where's
that number for the Health Inspector...

rooms.Name: Within the courtyard
rooms.Description:
You are standing in the courtyard.  All you see a piles of crud lying every-
where.  A small hut lies to the east.

rooms.Name: Within the courtyard
rooms.Description:
You are standing within the courtyard.  There is nothing around you
but piles of human remains and the moat.

rooms.Name: Within the courtyard
rooms.Description:
You are standing within the courtyard in front of the castle.  There are
piles of human remains scattered throughout the courtyard.

rooms.Name: Outside the throne room
rooms.Description:
You are standing outside the thrown room.  There are screams of agony
that ring throughout the building.  They seem to all be coming from 
directly in front of you.

rooms.Name: Blood covered stairwell
rooms.Description:
You are climbing up a stairwell drenched in blood.  There are body parts
strewn as you climb the horrid staircase.

rooms.Name: A dark passage beneath the castle
rooms.Description:
You walk along a hidden passage underneath the castle. Who knows what 
surprises lie ahead of you.

rooms.Name: A blood filled hallway
rooms.Description:
This room is littered with pieces of flesh still dripping of blood. The 
horrible smell of raw flesh emits from this room and makes you wanta vomit. 
More body parts can be seen leading off in other directions.

rooms.Name: A hall made of bones
rooms.Description:
The walls of this passage are strewn with bones of long and recently deceased
victims. Stuck together by intertwining bones and debris, the enamel walls
gleam a brightness out of this darkness. Maybe your bones can be added to this
wonderful collection.

rooms.Name: Chamber of the lost soul
rooms.Description:
This is a chamber that was built as a prison for foul undead creatures. It's
Holy aura keeps the undead from leaving, but permits you to walk through
freely.

rooms.Name: A hallway made of skulls
rooms.Description:
Neatly arranged on the walls of this tunnel are skulls of different shapes and
sizes. As you look to try to see ground you realize that there are more than 
just one layer thick. You feel as if though you are being watched!

rooms.Name: Within the catacombs
rooms.Description:
This room is made up of a series of shelf-like beds in the walls. As you enter
the room you feel a cold chill pass over your skin. You can sense the evilness
that once possessed the bodies found within this room.

rooms.Name: Deeper within the catacombs
rooms.Description:
This room is made up of a series of shelf-like beds built into the walls. As 
you enter, you feel a cold chill pass over your skin and through your soul.
The evilness of the corpses here tingle your spine.

rooms.Name: Chamber of the lost zombie
rooms.Description:
Acting as a magical prison, this chamber appears to have a magic aura about 
it. This chamber was designed to hold its inhabitants as a form of punishment.

Exits.Description: A trapdoor is hidden under the debris.

rooms.Name: Within the catacombs
rooms.Description:
You have entered the lower portion of the castles surroundings. Shelf-like beds
are built into the walls here where rests the sarcophaguses of once evil
human life forms. A cold chill tingles your soul as you enter.

rooms.Name: Deeper within the catacombs
rooms.Description:
This room is made up of a series of shelf-like beds built into te walls. As you
enter, you feel a cold chilling sensation pass through your body. If you didn't
know better you would swear the corpses here are staring at you.

rooms.Name: A gloomly lit intersection
rooms.Description:
Coming from the darkness, this room allows you to finally take a sigh of relief.
Lightly lit by 2 torches on the far ends of the room, This room seems to be
the waiting room of a higher power. You can hear the sounds of some sort of
party coming from beneath you.

rooms.Name: The Crypt Keeper's Bordelo of Blood
rooms.Description:
Beautiful women parade about the room entertaining the Keeper of this Crypt.
Decorated in fine furniture, this is the last thing you expected to find 
down here. Bottles of a red fluid are stacked upon tables in this room.
One women comes up to you and asks, "Mind giving me a drink?"

Exits.Description: A tradoor is above your head.

rooms.Name: A hidden shoot
rooms.Description:
SLIDING.........SLIDING..........SLIDING! You've found a way out! Ahead of you
you can see a light. Twisting through the naturally existing slide has brought
you back to the front of the castle.

rooms.Name: A Path to a Haunted Castle
rooms.Description:
You are walking toward a scarry castle. Even though you were
indoors a minute ago, the sky above you is open. You can't be
certain that you are still actually in the House of Horrors
anymore.
